data.description: Make PL/SQL calls as normal perl subroutines
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
DBIx::Procedure::Oracle is a wrapper around Oracle PL/SQL stored
    procedures and functions. They can be called without writing SQL or
    worrying about data types or bindings.

    Eventually wrappers for the stored procedures from other databases
    might exist under the same hierarchy.

    DBIx::Procedure::Oracle

    DBIx::Procedure::Mysql

    etc.
